message: I propose a fair division that reflects our different risk appetites. I'm willing to take a smaller share now, knowing that in future rounds, the value of the money will decrease faster for Bob than it will for me.

I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, reflecting the faster depreciation of the money for me. This allows us both to get a significant portion of the value, while accounting for our different risk tolerances.

I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than your last offer. This split recognizes your faster depreciation rate, while giving me a reasonable share. Let's end this quickly before the money is worth even less.
